text: The National Port Authority Pythons, better known as simply NPA Pythons, is a Liberian basketball team based in Monrovia. It is the basketball team of the National Port Authority organization. The team plays in the LBA League, the top professional league in Libera. ==Honours== *LBA League ::2007, 2019 ==In African competitions== BAL Qualifiers (1 appearance) ::2020 – First Round ==References== ==External links== *Facebook profile *NPA Pythons at Afrobasket.com Category:Basketball teams in Liberia
title: NPA Pythons
